name: Geneticognito
description: During the assault on a mysterious facility, a genetic experiment called Rane gets the chance to escape. However, to make it outside she'll have to pass through all the dangerous areas of the facility, fight hostile genetic experiments, and defeat the ones who've held her captive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 3 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11
